Text:
Thanks as always - really appreciate you knocking these out each and every week.

Legend !
Thanks man, these torrents of yours keep me in touch with the UK.
Right on! Thanks man, can't wait to see Holden smack that ball home.

thanks pooloop :)

and thanks for the spoiler majorx :(

Yeeeeeeeee Haaaaaaaa  It's been weeks me Ole Mate - I've been D/L but can't get on to write a load of lovely stuff on here saying wot a triffick job you are doin - 

Anyway I know you missed me ----- 

Loads ... RickeeBoy

And this from from Four Lions...

Barry: Bollocks, I'm a liability! I am the Invisible Jihadi! They seek him here, they seek him there, but here's not there, he's blowing up your slag sister!
Omar: Invisible? Right. Like the time you got on the local news for baking a Twin Towers cake and leaving it at the synagogue on 9/11?
Barry: That is part of the plan! Hide in plain sight, you mug!
